title: Alt+Tab Game bugsplats
body: Seems that every time that I try to check something else outside of game quick, my game crashes.  I alt+tab, check what I want to check, then click back into game and my game freezes for a second, then crashes.  Help please!

replies.body:
From personal experience, I know it really sucks when your game crashes out on you. Bugsplats can be caused by a number of different reasons, but our [Bugsplat guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964-Gifting-Guide-and-FAQ) goes over the most common fixes.

Let me know if those steps helped you out.
Hey man, the link you provided leads to the Gifting Guide and FAQ, not the Bugsplat guide...

Thanks for the help, even though it was the wrong link :P

I will let you know if it works next time I alt+tab.
Fortunately, we're not in the business of gifting bug splats.  :P  Thanks for providing the correct link, Ventura!  Please let us know if you have anymore questions.
